    • Method Detail

      • isRepeatEnable

        public static boolean isRepeatEnable(int repeat,
                                     int flag)
        To determine whether a day is set to repeat
        Parameters:
        repeat - The repeat value of alarm clock
        flag - REPEAT_FLAG_MON REPEAT_FLAG_TUE REPEAT_FLAG_WED REPEAT_FLAG_THU REPEAT_FLAG_FRI REPEAT_FLAG_SAT REPEAT_FLAG_SUN
        Returns:
        True is repeat. False not.

      • setRepeatEnable

        public static int setRepeatEnable(int repeat,
                                  int flag,
                                  boolean enable)
        Set one day to repeat or not.
        Parameters:
        repeat - The repeat value of alarm clock
        flag - REPEAT_FLAG_MON REPEAT_FLAG_TUE REPEAT_FLAG_WED REPEAT_FLAG_THU REPEAT_FLAG_FRI REPEAT_FLAG_SAT REPEAT_FLAG_SUN
        enable - True is enable repeat. False not.
        Returns:
        Changed value of repeat

      • isRepeatEnableIndex

        public static boolean isRepeatEnableIndex(int repeat,
                                          int index)
        To determine whether a day is set to repeat. isRepeatEnable(int, int)
        Parameters:
        repeat - The repeat value of alarm clock
        index - Index from 0 to 6, representatives from Monday to Sunday
        Returns:
        True is repeat. False not.

      • setRepeatEnableIndex

        public static int setRepeatEnableIndex(int repeat,
                                       int index,
                                       boolean enable)
        Set one day to repeat or not. setRepeatEnable(int, int, boolean)
        Parameters:
        repeat - The repeat value of alarm clock
        index - Index from 0 to 6, representatives from Monday to Sunday
        enable - True is enable repeat. False not.
        Returns:
        Changed value of repeat

      • getAlarmId

        public int getAlarmId()
        The alarm clock id. Mark a unique alarm clock.

        Can only add 5 alarm clocks. So the alarmId must in 0-4 ALARM_ID_MIN ALARM_ID_MAX

      • getRepeat

        public int getRepeat()
        The alarm clock repeat.

        Use isRepeatEnable(int, int) get repeat days.Use setRepeatEnable(int, int, boolean) set repeat days.

        If you changed this repeat value, don't forget save changed with setRepeat(int) method.

      • setRepeat

        public void setRepeat(int repeat)

      • adjustAlarm

        public void adjustAlarm()
        Before setting the alarm clock, it's better to call this method once. WristbandManager.setAlarmList(List) will auto call this method.
